alldb.table_sql:
select flr.id id, ci.contract_id contractname, ci.id contractid, ci.cust_id lesseeid, cust.cust_name lesseename, ci.project_name projectname, flr.preparer preparer, flr.serial_number serialnumber, flr.record_date recorddate, flr.dead_line deadline, flr.date_of_registration dateofregistration, flr.archive_number archivenumber, flr.rent_amount rentamount, flr.property_description propertydescription, v.fileaddress, v.FILENAME, v.REALNAME, v.CREATEDATE, v.fileid
from Finance_Lease_Registration flr left join contract_info ci on flr.contract_id=ci.id left join cust_info cust on ci.cust_id=cust.id left join (select A.file_key as flrid, wm_concat( A.file_address) as fileaddress, wm_concat( A.FILE_NAME ) AS FILENAME, wm_concat( A.CREATE_DATE) AS CREATEDATE, wm_concat(A.id) as fileid, wm_concat(U.REALNAME_ ) AS REALNAME from base_file A LEFT JOIN T_USERS U ON A.CREATOR_ = U.ID_ where A.file_key is not null and A.invalid_ ='æ˜¯' group by A.file_key ) v on v.flrid = flr.id where 1=1 /~contractname: and ci.contract_id like '%{contractname}%' ~/ /~lesseename: and cust.cust_name like '%{lesseename}%'~/ /~projectname: and ci.project_name like '%{projectname}%'~/
